scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:admin" "npm run dev:user"
scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && cross-env PORT=3000 nodemon server.js
scripts.build: npm run build:admin && npm run build:user
scripts.build:admin: cd admin && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:user: cd user && npm install && npm run build
scripts.start: cd backend && cross-env NODE_ENV=production PORT=3001 node server.js
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../admin && npm install && cd ../user && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules backend/node_modules admin/node_modules user/node_modules admin/dist user/dist
scripts.kill:3001: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "$p=(Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort 3001 -State Listen -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object -ExpandProperty OwningProcess -Unique); if($p){ $p | ForEach-Object { Stop-Process -Id $_ -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue }; Write-Host 'Killed PIDs: ' ($p -join ', ')} else { Write-Host 'No listeners on 3001' }"
scripts.start:3002: cd backend && cross-env NODE_ENV=production PORT=3002 node server.js
